website_summaries.verdict: A feminine girl's shoe that could use more support.
pros: Comes in white and black patent
cons: Some say these are too stiff for toddlers

customer_reviews.title: Sole is too hard and not bendable
customer_reviews.text: I love how cute the shoes are but i just don’t know why the sole is so hard and not bendable at all. We kept them but only wear them to church where she doesn’t walk a lot and is only in them for about 2 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Campbell

customer_reviews.title: They sent me used shoes...
customer_reviews.text: Needed the shoes for a baptism and it looked used on the inside but I needed them and couldn’t send them back so we dealt with it.. this is the second time. Sad ... 2 stars because the shoes actually fit her great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Shoe for Wide Kids Feet
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the sturdiness of this shoe on my 3 year old's feet. She's comfortable wearing it and not trying to take the shoe off like she does with other shoes. Thanks for the good quality!
customer_reviews.author: T Sama

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: We are never disappointed with Stride Rite. The shoes are true-to-size and fit comfortably. They made beautiful Easter shoes and would go well with any spring or summer outfit. I appreciate the Velcro-style buckles making the process of putting on my toddler's shoes easier. The soles grip well so there are no issues with slip and falls on slick floors. This is the kind of dress shoe a child could wear all day in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: ccml7578

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Easter and a wedding where my 2.5 yr old daughter was a flower girl. Didn't see any marks (wore with tights or socks) and she likes the fact that she can take them off on her own. She was dancing in these at the wedding reception so I think she's pretty comfortable in them!
customer_reviews.author: robertsonj

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes in my toddler! They're very cute and go great with her dresses. At first they seemed to be too tight and not fit her chunky feet. But because they're leather, they expanded so her feet slide in nicely. The only thing I don't like is how easily they scuff and it won't come off.
customer_reviews.author: Crispy89

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Too stiff for my 12 month olds feet. She just started walking and they were not comfortable at all. My 2 1/2 year old didn't mind as much but they weren't very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Trumpet Player

customer_reviews.title: Product came as if I bought directly from the department store!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe size fits as expected. Product came as if I bought directly from the store. I can’t wait for my daughter to wear them on Easter.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Plante

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong With Stride Rite
customer_reviews.text: The local Stride Rite is about a 45 minute drive from my house. Being able to order from Amazon and get it two-days later via Prime is a life saver. They really are the best shoes if you feel the sole inside. My little girl loves to wear her "princess" shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoes
customer_reviews.text: SUPER FAST shipping. Beautiful shoe. Well made and goes with everything. My daughter has a Wide foot and all she wears is Stride Rite. So excited that they fit so well. It is really hard to find dressy shoes to feet her chubby little feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani D.Catlett

customer_reviews.title: These are for my 10 month old granddaughter. I ...
customer_reviews.text: These are for my 10 month old granddaughter. I bought them large in order for her to wear them in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Blair

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for my daughter not that long ago. They are very nice white dress up shoes. I didn't realize that they were Velcro and not really buckle shoes when I ordered them. It didn't end up being an issue however.
customer_reviews.author: Torie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very still material. Gave my daughter blisters after a hour of wearing
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little white shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little white shoe for easter and all formal occasions!
customer_reviews.author: D Finocchiaro

customer_reviews.title: Quality !
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of dressy shoes ! Very high quality I wore this brand as a toddler and I will defiantly purchase stride rite shoes again and again for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not soft enough for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Like the design but dislike that it s not flexible for a Toddler
customer_reviews.author: nasso

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are fabulous
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old daughter loves the shoes. She wears it to church with her dresses and looks beautiful. Its no slip which is great. She loves to hear the heel noise on the floor. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Perfect size for my daughter flat, wide, super thick feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie K.

customer_reviews.title: but overall this was a good purchase. My daughter gets a lot of use ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a little more arch support, but overall this was a good purchase. My daughter gets a lot of use out of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Wendelyn

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves the shoes--picks them out to wear every day! Shoe is sturdy and sems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Darling shoe for little girls
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 6.5 shoe and had to send back and ordered size 6 which fit perfectly. The shoe is made well and is easy slip on with Velcro closure. The girls love it and so do I
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. Very good material and soft at the same time, may baby used them for 4 months and they look as new. I might buy them again now in a bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really a big fan of stride rite styles and prefer more European brands, but stride rite is so well made, and their sizing is so dead on, that it's no wonder they've been dressing American kids since well before this mama was born. The Velcro on these shoes could be a little stickier, but that's my only (barely a) complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen O'donnell

customer_reviews.title: Adorable easter shoe
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my two year old girl for Easter. They look darling and fit as expected (size 6). Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: great shoe. very comfortable. daughter has thick and wide feet and she is very comfortable and stable in them. not slippery. GREAT price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: They are so cute and look comfortable too. I would recommend these shoes to any ...
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute and look comfortable too. I would recommend these shoes to any child that needs it for a special occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Theodora

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for my baby. This is the 3rd pair of the same shoe I've bought for her. It l
customer_reviews.author: Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love Stride Rite shoes....we have owned several of these in ascending sizes.
customer_reviews.author: j r

customer_reviews.title: My little one complained about the shoes about comfort - ...
customer_reviews.text: My little one complained about the shoes about comfort - bought the Nina ones instead and she danced all night.
customer_reviews.author: fabiola

customer_reviews.title: The Shoes are fine
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are fine, but the belt is not buckled, for that use white velcro, this was something I did not like. However, the shoe is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ronquillo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fine shoes, made of all leather. Easy to clean, and comfortable for my toddler!
customer_reviews.author: cristy89

customer_reviews.title: Darling!
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect for Easter! I plan to buy another pair in the very near future! I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette K. Sleight

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet 7.5W
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them and her wide feet had ample space. They went well with her dressy Easter dress and people compliment her shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Brought that for my niece to wear for a ceremony ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought that for my niece to wear for a ceremony. She is 4 years old, and she loves the shoe, and not willing to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Fung

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Love that the strap is actually Velcro ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Love that the strap is actually Velcro so my daughter can take them off/put them on herself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Little Girls Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful girls shoes. Bought them for a wedding and they were perfect and look cute on. What a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Cuter than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I used to buy the Stride Rite Felicia and while this style (Camila Mary Jane) isn't as classic as the Felicia, they are still very cute and my daughter likes to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Leather is beautiful, well made and feminine looking. Shoes run big - order actual size foot is measured and room for growth is still available.
customer_reviews.author: dkeep

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Used for my daughter's baptism and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Used for my daughter's baptism and they were perfect. I like that there aren't any buckles that would snag her tights.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: love that the buckle is velcro
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoe, love that the buckle is velcro! scuff marks are easy to remove with baby wipe! would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Mary Janes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter to wear to a wedding. So far, she has only tried them on, but the fit looks good. Velcro under the buckle made it easy to put on her feet. The pattern on the shoes is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ford

customer_reviews.title: wedding
customer_reviews.text: shoes were bought for a wedding that my daughter was in. She loves them and always want to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela D Wallace

customer_reviews.title: but made her feet look really chubby like a sausage and afraid it may be painful after ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping these cute shoe would work for my toddler's baptism but when she tried them on, they were too stiff and the shoe cut into the top of her foot. The shoes were the right size, but made her feet look really chubby like a sausage and afraid it may be painful after wearing for an extended period of time. Disappointed because I do really like and trust the Stride rite brand but had to return these.
customer_reviews.author: EssDee

product_meta.title: Stride Rite Camila Mary Jane (Toddler)
product_meta.description:
Light-handed perforations are finished with a single stone in this precious dress shoe by Stride Rite.

She's as pretty as mom and all dressed up in the Camila dress shoe from Stride Rite. With pearlized leather and delicate detailing on the toe this shoe is too pretty to take off. Plus with a comfortable insole and an adjustable hook-and-loop strap she actually likes wearing this pretty shoe.

Stride Rite designs and engineers footwear specifically to meet the needs of growing children. Stride Rite's mission is to encourage kids and support parents by developing and marketing products that help children embrace life's possibilities and adventures with confidence. Stride Rite shoes aren't like any other shoes you'll buy. They're better. With more than 85 years of experience, they've learned a few things about their craft. Stride Rite is the one company that's been helping kids run, jump, leap, grow, and playfully express themselves since 1919.

See more
feature_bullets: Light-handed perforations are finished with a single stone in this precious dress shoe by Stride Rite.
